data.title: Diversity and Inclusion
data.meta_description: Fermilab’s workforce consists of 1,820 employees, who are 23 percent female and 77 percent male. This page shows the laboratory diversity demographics.
data.text:
Workforce, diversity profiles and trends

Fermilab develops, implements and maintains purposeful and intentional strategic initiatives to support a respectful organizational culture and intellectually diverse workplace.

Fermilab’s workforce consists of 2,160 employees (as of September 30, 2023), who are 28 percent female and 72 percent male. Explore detailed laboratory demographics and track progress in an interactive dashboard.

Laboratory demographics

Updated October 1, 2023

Trend demographics for the laboratory employee population between 2016 and 2023 are available in downloadable format.

Please reach inclusion@fnal.gov with any questions.
